pages.text: $(li)Moose are neutral, large, tall, brown hairy mammals with 2 large antlers of their head that that live in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taigas$(/l).$(br)$(li)Moose can sometimes be seen wandering with their children following closely behind.$(br)$(li)Around every 7 to 10 days, Moose may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/moose_antler)Moose Antler$(/l).
Moose may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/moose_ribs)Raw Moose Ribs$(/l) upon death.
$(li)If two adult Moose are near each other, they will jostle for dominance.
